      • loadIntroPageInfo

        @RequestMapping("/")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> loadIntroPageInfo​()
        Loads an introductory page detailing location of data repository, along with some instructions on how to access the rest of the APIs. Maps to GET("/") method.
        Returns:
        List of strings to be parsed in the main page as json message

      • getAllDates

        @RequestMapping("/ByDate")
@Cacheable("fileNamesInRepository")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAllDates​()
        Lists out all files available in the data repository Maps to GET("/ByDate") method.
        Returns:
        List of strings of format "yyyy-MM-dd.txt" to be parsed in the page as json message

      • getRateByDate

        @RequestMapping("/ByDate/{date}")
@Cacheable(value="fileName",
           key="#date")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getRateByDate​(@PathVariable
                                                      java.lang.String date)
        Returns exchange rates for all currencies for a given date Maps to GET("/ByDate/{date}") method.
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        Returns:
        If date is valid and data is available, the method returns a list of objects(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message list. Otherwise return error message.

      • getSpecificRateByDate

        @RequestMapping("/ByDate/{date}/{currencyOfInterest}")
@Cacheable(value="singleEntryByCurrencyByDate",
           key="#date + #currencyOfInterest")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecificRateByDate​(@PathVariable("date")
                                                              java.lang.String date,
                                                              @PathVariable("currencyOfInterest")
                                                              java.lang.String currencyOfInterest)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date Maps to GET("/ByDate/{date}/{currencyOfInterest}") method.
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message.

      • getSpecificRateByDate

        @RequestMapping("/ByDate/{date}/{currencyOfInterest}/{referenceCurrency}")
@Cacheable(value="singleEntryByCurrencyByDateNewRef",
           key="#date + #currencyOfInterest + #referenceCurrency")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecificRateByDate​(@PathVariable("date")
                                                              java.lang.String date,
                                                              @PathVariable("currencyOfInterest")
                                                              java.lang.String currencyOfInterest,
                                                              @PathVariable("referenceCurrency")
                                                              java.lang.String referenceCurrency)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date using a specified reference currency (non-USD included). Maps to GET("/ByDate/{date}/{currencyOfInterest}/{referenceCurrency}") method.
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        referenceCurrency - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest,referenceCurrency is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message. Error message to be returned if currencyOfInterest==referenceCurrency.

      • getAllCurrencies

        @RequestMapping("/ByCurrency")
@Cacheable("listAllCurrencies")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAllCurrencies​()
        Provide static instructions on accessing exchange rates for specified currencies and date ranges. Maps to GET("/ByCurrency") method.
        Returns:
        Static instructions on accessing exchange rates for specified currencies and date ranges.

      • getRateByCurrency

        @RequestMapping("/ByCurrency/{currencyOfInterest}")
@Cacheable(value="allEntriesByCurrency",
           key="#currencyOfInterest")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getRateByCurrency​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.String currencyOfInterest)
        Provide static instructions on accessing exchange rates for specified currencies and date ranges. Maps to GET("/ByCurrency/{currencyOfInterest}") method.
        Parameters:
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive.
        Returns:
        Static instructions on accessing exchange rates for specified currencies and date ranges.

      • getSpecificRateByCurrency

        @RequestMapping("/ByCurrency/{currencyOfInterest}/{date}")
@Cacheable(value="singleEntryByCurrencyAndDate",
           key="#date + #currencyOfInterest")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecificRateByCurrency​(@PathVariable("currencyOfInterest")
                                                                  java.lang.String currencyOfInterest,
                                                                  @PathVariable("date")
                                                                  java.lang.String date)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date Maps to GET("/ByCurrency/{currencyOfInterest}/{date}") method.
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message.

      • getSpecifiedRatesByCurrency

        @RequestMapping("/ByCurrency/{currencyOfInterest}/{startDate}/{endDate}")
@Cacheable(value="specifiedEntriesByCurrencyAndDateRange",
           key="#startDate + #endDate + #currencyOfInterest")
public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecifiedRatesByCurrency​(@PathVariable("currencyOfInterest")
                                                                    java.lang.String currencyOfInterest,
                                                                    @PathVariable("startDate")
                                                                    java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                    @PathVariable("endDate")
                                                                    java.lang.String endDate)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date range
        Parameters:
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        startDate - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        endDate - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        Returns:
        If currencyOfInterest, startDate, endDate is valid and data is available, the method returns a list of objects(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message list. Otherwise return error message.
